title: Bitcoin Miner Tied to Trump Sons Plans Dubai Crypto Trading Team
description: A Trump family-linked Bitcoin miner plans to set up an office in Dubai, a growing hub for the cryptocurrency industry known for its friendly approach to taxation and regulation.

title: Trump Crypto Venture Raises $220 Million for Bitcoin Mining
